QuestData.Title: Vengeance for Orsis
QuestData.Description: The great city of Orsis was attacked by the armies of air.$B$BWe were taken prisoner. We were the lucky ones.$B$BMost died, trapped beneath the choking desert sands.$B$BAsaad, Al'Akir's caliph, ordered the attack... and he must pay with his life.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Asaad, under Al'Akir's orders, oversaw the devastation of Orsis. Make him pay!
QuestData.RewardText: Blessings upon you. Please accept this as a token of my gratitude.
